## InitContext.schedule() method

Schedule a command to run.

**Signature:**

```typescript
schedule(cmd: Cmd<Msg>): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

cmd


</td><td>

[Cmd](./tea.cmd.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Msg](./tea.msg.md)<!-- -->&gt;


</td><td>

Command to schedule


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Commands scheduled during init will be executed after the app starts. Use this to trigger initial async operations like fetching data.
